property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash a card from your grip: Break ice subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The server was quiet that night. I closed my eyes, the low-hum of the datastream lulling me into a trance. When I opened them, the construct stood before me in the shape of a man, clad in light of many colors. His stature was impressive, and his saccharine voice wormed its way into my very soul.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Trash a card from your grip: Break ice subroutine.||Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time). [Trash]: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whaddya buyin'?"

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Tech Lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you use a [Trash] ability, draw 1 card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything has a price."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [Click]. Expose 1 card installed in a remote server. Trash that card at no cost if it is an asset or upgrade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1[Link] [Trash]: Avoid or remove 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Using the exact same rig as a million other people is just another form of security through anonymity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 2[Link], the memory cost of Shiv is 0, even if it is not installed. Shiv has +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. [Trash]: Break up to 3 sentry subroutines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, access 1 card from HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Muertos has no fear of the law. Muertos is the law.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card. When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost. [Trash]: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: La SeÃ±ora de las Sombras giveth and taketh away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you install Chameleon, name sentry, code gate or barrier. Add Chameleon to your grip when your turn ends. 1[Credits]: Break a subroutine of the named subtype.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may remove Hyperdriver from the game and gain [Click][Click][Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It doesn't actually bend time. It just feels like it. That's relativity." -Hayley Kaplan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Test Ground can be advanced. [Trash]: Derez 1 card for each advancement token on Test Ground.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Isn't this wrong?" "Not legally. They didn't read the fine print."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The first time the Runner takes a brain damage each turn, he or she takes 1 additional brain damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Allele Repression can be advanced. [Trash]: Exchange 1 card in HQ with 1 card in Archives for each advancement token on Allele Repression.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: You and the Runner secretly spend 0[Credits], 1[Credits], or 2[Credits]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, resolve 1 subroutine on a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ExposÃ© can be advanced. [Trash]: Remove 1 bad publicity for each advancement token on ExposÃ©.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is your neighbor secretly a violent criminal? The answer to this chilling question and more, right after the break." -Shannon Claire, SSN 5

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged. [Subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Underway Renovation faceup. Whenever you advance Underway Renovation, trash the top card of the Runner's stack (or the top 2 cards instead if there are 4 or more advancement tokens on Underway Renovation).

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "[Click], [Trash]: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You want no questions asked, hire someone else. I have two: who and how much?"

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] End the run. [Subroutine] End the run. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let me tell you a secret. There's no such thing as impenetrable ice. It has to allow access, or else why is the server on the Network in the first place? But that doesn't mean they have to make it easy." -g00ru

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ice protecting this server cannot be bypassed. Cards in and protecting this server cannot be exposed. Limit 1 region per server.
